DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety Huaier Granule prevention disease progression hepatocarcinoma non-radical hepatectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Huaier Granule Prevention Disease Progression Hepatocarcinoma After Non-radical Hepatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: A Prospective , Multicenter , Open-labeled , Parallel -controlled Clinical Study , evaluate efficacy safety Huaier Granule prevention disease progression hepatocarcinoma non-radical hepatectomy .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age : ≥ 18 ≤ 75 year , male female ; 2 . Nonradical hepatectomy perform hepatocellular carcinoma ; 3 . The hepatocellular carcinoma confirm pathological examination ; 4 . The liver kidney function satisfies follow condition within 15 day surgery ( exclude day 15 ) : aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , glutamicoxalacetic transaminase ( ALT ) < 3 upper limit normal ( ULN ) , total bilirubin ≤2 ULN , serum creatinine < 1.5 ULN ; 5 . Other laboratory test meet following requirement within 15 day surgery ( exclude day 15 ) : Hb≥9g/dl , platelet count≥60×109/L , neutrophil count > 2.5×109/L ; 6 . The expected survival time ≥12 week ; 7 . The subject volunteer sign inform consent . 1 . Nonhepatocellular carcinoma patient ; 2 . Those received radical hepatectomy ; 3 . Those hepatic decompensation ; 4 . Pregnant lactating woman ; 5 . Those HIV infection AIDSassociated diseases ; 6 . Those severe acute chronic disease , infection , diabetes cardiac insufficiency , pulmonary insufficiency , renal insufficiency ; 7 . Those take drug oral route ; develop serious adverse drug reaction ; 8 . Drug abuser psychological mental disease may interfere study compliance ; 9 . Conditions consider suitable study investigator .
